scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/; rm -rf target/; mkdir -p dist target
scripts.gen: cp src/index.html target/index.html && cp dist/build.min.js target/b.js
scripts.build-nominify: npm run clean && npm run concat && npm run nominify && npm run gen
scripts.build-nominify-purejs: npm run concat && npm run nominify && npm run gen
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production; npm run clean && npm run concat && npm run minify && npm run gen && npm run minify-html && npm run zip
scripts.watch: nodemon -e js,sh,html --watch src --watch lib --watch tooling --exec npm run build-nominify-purejs;
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run liveserver
scripts.watchlite: nodemon -e js,sh,html --watch src --watch lib --watch tooling --exec npm run concatlite
scripts.lite: npm run watchlite & npm run liveserver
